name: team.integrationLogs
desc: This method lists the integration activity logs for a team, including when integrations are added, modified and removed. This method can only be called by Admins.

service_id.desc: Filter logs to this service. Defaults to all logs.

app_id.desc: Filter logs to this Slack app. Defaults to all logs.

user.desc: Filter logs generated by this user's actions. Defaults to all logs.

change_type.desc: Filter logs with this change type. Defaults to all logs.

errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
errors.user_is_bot: This method cannot be called by a bot user.
